summary: In the preface, Will Larson reflects on his journey as a writer, starting from a humble blog post in 2007 to the creation of this book. He acknowledges the significant experiences and mistakes that shaped his writing voice over a decade. The author emphasizes the transformative environment at Stripe, which encouraged bold initiatives like publishing a book. Larson expresses hope that readers will find valuable insights within these pages. He also invites feedback, highlighting the importance of community in the learning process.

slides.section_body: The journey of writing began on April 7, 2007, with a blog post titled 'Finding Our Programming Flow.' This initial venture was characterized by inexperience and room for growth. Each post served as a stepping stone towards a more defined writing voice, built through trial and error over the years.
slides.quote: Every great writer starts with a single word.

slides.section_body: It took 200 posts and a decade of challenges to refine my craft. Each misstep became a valuable lesson contributing to my growth as a writer. This process underscored the importance of perseverance and learning from one's experiences.
slides.quote: Mistakes are the foundation of learning.

slides.section_body: My time at Stripe provided a unique opportunity for growth. It was a place where ambitious ideas flourished, enabling projects that others might hesitate to pursue. The culture encouraged experimentation and bold initiatives, which deeply influenced my perspective on leadership.
slides.quote: A supportive environment can make the impossible feel possible.

slides.section_body: This book is a product of collective encouragement from colleagues and the experiences gathered over the years. It represents a significant milestone where my writings converge into a cohesive narrative. The aim is to share insights that I've gathered throughout my journey.
slides.quote: Our thoughts become tangible when shared with the world.

slides.section_body: I value the input of readers and encourage open dialogue. Your thoughts and comments are crucial in refining not only the work presented here but also my learning as an author. This book is as much yours as it is mine.
slides.quote: Feedback is a gift that fuels growth.

slides.section_body: Writing over the years has been a transformative process guided by continuous practice. From my first post to now, each piece reflects my evolving understanding of leadership and management. I aim to distill these insights into practical lessons for others.
slides.quote: The power of writing is the journey it sparks.

slides.section_body: The community around my writing has played a significant role in shaping my perspective. Sharing experiences and learning alongside others enhances the depth of understanding. I am grateful for the support that has fueled this endeavor.
slides.quote: Community is the backbone of shared learning.

slides.section_body: The act of sharing my thoughts publicly involves a level of vulnerability that fosters connection. Embracing this vulnerability has allowed authenticity to shine through my writing. Itâ€™s essential to be open to both praise and critique.

I hope that each reader finds valuable insights that resonate with their own journey. My desire is that the contents of this book spark reflection and inspire action in their professional lives. Sharing knowledge is part of a larger mission for growth.
slides.quote: May your journey be enriched by the insights shared.

slides.section_body: As this book marks a new beginning, I look forward to the conversations it will ignite. I invite you to join me on this path, sharing insights and experiences as we navigate the complexities of leadership together. The story continues beyond the pages.
slides.quote: Every ending sparks a new beginning.
